BUTTON.SCRIPT: if( CheckNil(g_world == nil) ) then return false end if( CheckNil(g_world:IsNil()) ) then return false end if true ~= g_world:IsHaveWorldAttr(GATTR_FLAG_RUNNING_PARTY) then if g_EpFindWindow == 1 then CallPartyListFind() else CallUI("SFRM_PARTY_PART_FIND") end else g_ChatMgrClient:AddEventMessage(799375, true, 1, 11) end
if IsInParty() then UISelf:SetStaticTextW(GetTextW(799346)) else UISelf:SetStaticTextW(GetTextW(799345)) end

if IsInExpedition() then CommonMsgBox(GetTT(720001):GetStr(), true) return end if( CheckNil(g_world == nil) ) then return false end if( CheckNil(g_world:IsNil()) ) then return false end if GATTR_FLAG_RUNNING_PARTY ~= g_world:GetAttr() then CallPartyCreate() else end

local self = UISelf self:OnOk() self:CloseParent() return true

MSG_BOX.SCRIPT: if g_fBoxLimitTime ~= nil then if GetAccumTime() - g_fBoxLimitTime >= 1 then g_fBoxLimitTime = GetAccumTime() g_fPartyTime = g_fPartyTime - 1 if g_fPartyTime > 0 then local sdw = UISelf:GetControl("FRM_MESSAGE") if false == sdw:IsNil() then local kOrgMessage = UISelf:GetCustomDataAsStr():GetStr() kOrgMessage = string.gsub(kOrgMessage, "%$REMAIN_SEC%$", g_fPartyTime) sdw:SetStaticText( kOrgMessage ) end else UISelf:GetControl("BTN_CANCEL"):OnCancel() UISelf:Close() return end end end

if GetAccumTime() > g_fPartyPeopleListSearchRefreshTime then g_fPartyPeopleListSearchRefreshTime = GetAccumTime() + 5.0 CallSend_RequestPartyPeopleList() else CommonMsgBoxByTextTable(401010,true) end

if FPL_TITLEGREATER == GetFindPartyUserListSortMethod() then SetFindPartyUserListSortMethod(FPL_TITLELESS) else SetFindPartyUserListSortMethod(FPL_TITLEGREATER) end FindPartyUserListViewRefresh(PartyFindPeopleListNowPage(), g_kListAttribute)

if true == g_bIsPraiveRegist then SendUnRegistPrivate() else CallUI("SFRM_PRIVATE_REGIST") end

if IsPartyMaster( g_pilotMan:GetPlayerPilotGuid() ) or IsInParty() then UISelf:Disable(true) else UISelf:Disable(false) end
if true == g_bIsPraiveRegist then SetTextOnThisUI(799388) else SetTextOnThisUI(799349) end
if GetAccumTime() > g_fPartyPromoteTime then g_fPartyPromoteTime = GetAccumTime() + 30.0 g_fPromoteTime = 30 PromoteParty() else CallUI("SFRM_MSG_PROMOTE") end

local kMyGuid = g_pilotMan:GetPlayerPilotGuid() if not IsPartyMaster(kMyGuid) or not IsInParty() then UISelf:Disable(true) else UISelf:Disable(false) end if true == g_bCount then if GetAccumTime() - g_CountTime >= 1 then g_CountTime = GetAccumTime() g_fPromoteTime = g_fPromoteTime - 1 end end

STATIC_FORM.SCRIPT: g_bCount = false g_fProteLimitTime = GetAccumTime() local sdw = UISelf:GetControl("SFR_SDW") local kOrgMessage = GetTT(799389):GetStr() kOrgMessage = string.gsub(kOrgMessage, "#REMAINSEC#", g_fPromoteTime) sdw:SetStaticText( kOrgMessage )

if g_fProteLimitTime ~= nil then if GetAccumTime() - g_fProteLimitTime >= 1 then g_fProteLimitTime = GetAccumTime() g_fPromoteTime = g_fPromoteTime - 1 if g_fPromoteTime > 0 then local sdw = UISelf:GetControl("SFR_SDW") if false == sdw:IsNil() then local kOrgMessage = GetTT(799389):GetStr() kOrgMessage = string.gsub(kOrgMessage, "#REMAINSEC#", g_fPromoteTime) sdw:SetStaticText( kOrgMessage ) end else UISelf:GetControl("BTN_CANCEL"):OnCancel() UISelf:Close() return end end end

BUTTON.SCRIPT: if GetAccumTime() > g_fExpeditionUserListSearchRefreshTime then g_fExpeditionUserListSearchRefreshTime = GetAccumTime() + 5.0 Send_C_M_REQ_LIST_USER_EXPEDITION() else CommonMsgBoxByTextTable(401010,true) end

DUMMY.SCRIPT: local Parent = UISelf:GetParent() if Parent:IsNil() then return end local CBtn = Parent:GetControl("CHK_INVITESTATE") if CBtn:IsNil() then return end if CBtn:GetCheckState() then CBtn:CheckState(false) else CBtn:CheckState(true) end

FORM.SCRIPT: if IsExpeditionMaster(g_pilotMan:GetPlayerPilotGuid()) then UISelf:GetControl("EDT_EXPEDITION_NAME"):Visible(true) else UISelf:GetControl("EDT_EXPEDITION_NAME"):Visible(false) end local RegWnd = GetUIWnd("FRM_EXPEDITION_REGISTER") if RegWnd:IsNil() then return end UISelf:SetLocation(Point2(RegWnd:GetLocation():GetX() - RegWnd:GetSize():GetX() + 25, RegWnd:GetLocation():GetY()))

BUTTON.SCRIPT: if GetAccumTime() > g_fExpeditionRenameTime then g_fExpeditionRenameTime = GetAccumTime() + 5.0 ExpeditionName_Change_Apply(UISelf:GetParent():GetControl("EDT_EXPEDITION_NAME")) else CommonMsgBoxByTextTable(720044,true) end
if IsExpeditionMaster(g_pilotMan:GetPlayerPilotGuid()) then UISelf:Disable(false) else UISelf:Disable(true) end

EDIT.HOTKEY: if UISelf:IsFocus() then ClearEditFocus() end return true

BUTTON.SCRIPT: if IsExpeditionMaster(g_pilotMan:GetPlayerPilotGuid()) then local slf = UISelf ClearEditFocus() local inter = CallUI("SFRM_EXPEDITION_LEVEL_INTER") local slfPos = slf:GetTotalLocation() slfPos:SetX(slfPos:GetX() - inter:GetSize():GetX()) slfPos:SetY(slfPos:GetY() + 23) inter:SetLocation(slfPos) end
if IsExpeditionMaster(g_pilotMan:GetPlayerPilotGuid()) then UISelf:Disable(false) else UISelf:Disable(true) end
if IsExpeditionMaster(g_pilotMan:GetPlayerPilotGuid()) then UISelf:SetStaticTextW(GetTextW(710011)) else UISelf:SetStaticTextW(GetTextW(560006)) end

LIST.SCRIPT:
UISelf:ClearAllListItem() wLev = GetTextW(3331):GetStr() UISelf:AddNewListItemChar("-1 ~ +1"):GetWnd():SetCustomDataAsInt(g_kDefaultLevelLimit) UISelf:AddNewListItemChar("-3 ~ +3"):GetWnd():SetCustomDataAsInt(g_kLevelLimit3) UISelf:AddNewListItemChar("-5 ~ +5"):GetWnd():SetCustomDataAsInt(g_kLevelLimit5) UISelf:AddNewListItemChar("-10 ~ +10"):GetWnd():SetCustomDataAsInt(g_kLevelLimit10) UISelf:AddNewListItemChar(wLev):GetWnd():SetCustomDataAsInt(0)
local kSize = UISelf:GetSize() local iCount = UISelf:GetListItemCount() kSize:SetY(23 * iCount) UISelf:SetSize(kSize)
local kParentSize = UISelf:GetParent():GetSize() kParentSize:SetY(23 * iCount) UISelf:GetParent():SetSize(kParentSize)

FORM.SCRIPT: local MyTeam = GetMemberTeamNumber(g_pilotMan:GetPlayerPilotGuid()) if 5 ~= MyTeam then g_EpCurrSelectTeam = MyTeam end OnSelectExpeditionTeam(UISelf:GetControl("FRM_BODY"), g_EpCurrSelectTeam) OnCall_ExpeditionOptionInit() local Wnd = GetUIWnd("FRM_PARTY_STATE") if nil ~= Wnd:IsNil() then Wnd:Close() end

local TailWnd = UISelf:GetControl("FRM_TAIL") if false == TailWnd:IsNil() then if IsExpeditionMaster(g_pilotMan:GetPlayerPilotGuid()) then TailWnd:GetControl("BTN_ENTER"):Visible(true) TailWnd:GetControl("BTN_CANCLE"):Visible(true) TailWnd:GetControl("BTN_LEAVE"):Visible(false) else TailWnd:GetControl("BTN_ENTER"):Visible(false) TailWnd:GetControl("BTN_CANCLE"):Visible(false) TailWnd:GetControl("BTN_LEAVE"):Visible(true) end end local Wnd = GetUIWnd("FRM_PARTY_STATE") if nil ~= Wnd:IsNil() then Wnd:Close() end ShowExpeditionInfo()

BUTTON.SCRIPT: if 3 > g_EpRegisterWindowState then g_EpRegisterWindowState = g_EpRegisterWindowState + 1 else g_EpRegisterWindowState = 1 end MinimizeRegisterWindow(g_EpRegisterWindowState)
if IsExpeditionMaster(g_pilotMan:GetPlayerPilotGuid()) then UISelf:Disable(false) else UISelf:Disable(true) end

BUTTON.HOTKEY: local OptionWnd = GetUIWnd("FRM_EXPEDITION_OPTION") local InviteWnd = GetUIWnd("FRM_EXPEDITION_INVITATION") if false == OptionWnd:IsNil() and OptionWnd:IsVisible() then OptionWnd:Close() return true end if false == InviteWnd:IsNil() and InviteWnd:IsVisible() then InviteWnd:Close() return true end Send_C_M_REQ_NPC_ENTER_EXPEDITION() return true

FORM.SCRIPT: CloseUI("FRM_COMMON_POPUP") ResetExpeditionListOver() UISelf:GetControl("SFRM_LISTOVER"):Visible(true) if IsExpeditionMaster(g_pilotMan:GetPlayerPilotGuid()) then Register_Expedition_Popup(UISelf) else Community_Expedition_Popup(UISelf) end CloseToolTip()
local OwnerGuid = UISelf:GetOwnerGuid() local ClassNo = GetClassNumber(OwnerGuid) if 0 == idx then return end CallMutableToolTipText(GetTT(30000 + ClassNo), GetUIWnd("Cursor"):GetLocation())
